title: Adjust Daily Production Schedule
description: A shift supervisor needs to adjust the daily production schedule due to an unexpected machine breakdown.

tasks.description: Identify the affected production line and the jobs currently scheduled.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies all jobs impacted by the machine downtime.

tasks.description: Find an alternative machine or production line and assess its capacity and availability.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies a viable alternative line for rescheduling the jobs.

tasks.description: Update the production schedule to reroute the affected jobs and notify the floor staff.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the schedule in the MES and sends a notification.
